checkpoints.description: Completed Turso migration - database schema, API client, Workers API
Implemented TTN types and utilities (payload encoding, validation, formatters)
Implemented TTN config store with session storage and listener pattern
Created custom React hooks (useDevices, useTelemetry, useTTNConfig, usePolling)
Created DeviceManager component with CRUD operations and industrial aesthetic
Created WebhookSettings component with TTN configuration and validation
Created TelemetryChart component with Recharts visualization and CSV export
Created LoRaWANEmulator orchestrator with tabs and simulation controls
Implemented TTN settings endpoints (GET/POST/test) with API connection validation
Implemented TTN simulation logic - uplink generation, payload encoding, API integration
Frontend integration complete - simulation controls, toast notifications, lint fixed
Stack Auth integration complete - JWT verification, protected routes, RBAC implemented

notes: Architecture change: Switched from FusionAuth to Stack Auth
Stack Auth provides React SDK, JWT verification, and multi-tenant support
Estimated effort: 6-10 hours for full integration
